data: We are at Como, on the lake—that spot so beloved of opera dancers—the day-dream of prima donnas—the Elysium of retired barytones!
We are at Como, on the lake--that spot so beloved of opera dancers--the day-dream of prima donnas--the Elysium of retired barytones!
Davenport Dunn, a Man of Our Day. Volume 1
Davenport Dunn, a Man of Our Day. Volume 1 (of 2)
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
